name.description: Unique identifier for the theme. This is used to identify the theme in the settings and in the UI and must match the file's basename.
name.patternErrorMessage: Theme name must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.

displayName.description: Display name of the theme. This is displayed in the UI.
displayName.patternErrorMessage: Theme name must not contain new lines.

version.description: Version of the theme. This is used to identify the version of the theme in the settings and in the UI.
version.patternErrorMessage: Version must be in the format x.y.z where x, y and z are numbers.

semanticHighlighting.description: Whether semantic highlighting should be enabled for this theme.
